channel.title: Simple question

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

2nd half of code

[code]/*
Trapdoors: ID 1568, 1569, 1570, 1571
Ladders: ID 1759, 2113
Climb rope: 1762, 1763, 1764

                            if(objectID == 6912) { // Xerozcheez: This object requires to be 3 sqs minium, so we change it ;)
                            destinationRange = 3;
                            } 
                            else if(objectID == 6672 || objectID == 6673) { // Xerozcheez: These objects requires to be 1 sqs max, so we change it ;)
                            destinationRange = 1;
                            } 
                            else {
                            destinationRange = 2;
                            }

                            if(GoodDistance(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, destinationRange)) {
                            viewTo(objectX, objectY);
                            objectClick(objectID, objectX, objectY, 0, 0, 1);
                            }
                            else {
                            ActionType = 1;
                            destinationX = objectX;
                            destinationY = objectY;
                            destinationID = objectID;
                            WalkingTo = true;
                            }

if (objectID == 4484)
{
castleWarsScore();
}

{

playerIsZamorak = true;

sendMessage(“You joined the Zammy Team!”);
sendMessage(“You cannot log out while in Castle Wars - if you wish to, leave!”);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“A game is currently running. Please wait “+CWT/2+” more seconds.”);
}
}

if (objectID == 4903)
{
if(playerIsZamorak == true)
{
if((playerHasItem(4037)) || (playerEquipment[3] == 4037))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" scored a point for Zammy!";
addItem(995, 5000000);
addItem(1042, 1);
txt4 = “I owned you guys with my skills! Go Zammy!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
setAnimation(2109);
sendMessage(“You win a phat and money for scoring!”);
ZS += 1;
remove(4037, 3);
deleteItem(4037, getItemSlot(4037), 1);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“This is YOUR flag. Go get the other teams’!”);
}
}
else if(playerIsSaradomin == true && (playerHasItem(4039) || playerEquipment[3] == 4039))
{
sendMessage(“You already stole the flag!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" stole the Zamorak team’s flag! Go get 'em!";
addItem(4039, 1);
wear(4039, getItemSlot(4039));
}
}

if (objectID == 4902)
{

{

txt4 = “I owned you guys with my skills! Go Sara!”;

setAnimation(2109);
sendMessage(“You win a phat and money for scoring!”);
SS += 1;
remove(4039, 3);
deleteItem(4039, getItemSlot(4039), 1);
}
else
{
sendMessage(“This is YOUR flag. Go get the other teams’!”);
}
}
else if(playerIsSaradomin == false && (playerHasItem(4037) || playerEquipment[3] == 4037))
{
sendMessage(“You already stole the flag - back off.”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" stole the Saradomin team’s flag! Go get 'em!";
addItem(4037, 1);
wear(4037, getItemSlot(4037));
}
}

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

…ok this is my last try and if i get no solution to my problem i completely give up…

i have been trying for way too long now…

ok so does castle wars tut made by newb work for pimpscape???

2nd if it does tell me how to do it plz…

i have tried to make it work for days now…
at first i got 4 errors then i fixed down to 1 error

here it is…

client.java:18402: orphaned case case 252: // atObject2 ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

here is where it is located in my client…

/* <Dungeon> Trapdoors: ID 1568, 1569, 1570, 1571 Ladders: ID 1759, 2113 Climb rope: 1762, 1763, 1764 */ case 132: int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int face = 0; int face2 = 0; int GateID = 1; //Agility by Dahornay //Gnome if(objectID == 2295){ addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(844); sendMessage("You crawl across the log!"); teleportToX = 2474; teleportToY = 3429; } if(objectID == 2285){ addSkillXP((2000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(828); sendMessage("You climb the net"); teleportToX = 2473; teleportToY = 3423; heightLevel = 1; } if(objectID == 2313){ addSkillXP((2500*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(828); teleportToX = 2473; teleportToY = 3420; sendMessage("You climb the tree branch"); heightLevel = 2; } if(objectID == 2312){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(844); teleportToX = 2483; teleportToY = 3420; sendMessage("You crawl across the rope"); heightLevel = 2; } if(objectID == 2314){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(828); teleportToX = 2485; teleportToY = 3420; sendMessage("You climb down the tree branch"); heightLevel = 0; } if(objectID == 2286 && objectX == 2487 && objectY == 3426){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(828); teleportToX = 2488; teleportToY = 3427; sendMessage("You climb over the net"); heightLevel = 0; } if(objectID == 2286 && objectX == 2485 && objectY == 3426){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(828); teleportToX = 2484; teleportToY = 3427; sendMessage("You climb over the net"); heightLevel = 0; } if(objectID == 154){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(749); teleportToX = 2484; teleportToY = 3437; sendMessage("You crawl through the pipe"); heightLevel = 0; } if(objectID == 4058){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(749); teleportToX = 2487; heightLevel = 0; } if(objectID == 2294){ addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[16]), 16); startAnimation(844); teleportToX = 2541; teleportToY = 3546; sendMessage("You crawl across the log"); heightLevel = 0;
